definition: Spider-Man, see 蜘蛛俠|蜘蛛侠/nickname of French skyscraper climber Alain Robert (1962-)/person who scales the outer walls of a building as a stunt or for building maintenance

sentences.english: I thought the Spiderman movie was very good work.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛人这部电影做得很棒。

sentences.english: The spiderman moves with feline agility .
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛人的动作像猫一们灵活。

sentences.english: Have you seen the new Spider-Man movie?
sentences.chinese: 你有看过那部新的蜘蛛人电影吗？

sentences.english: We watched the sequel to "Spiderman" on TV.
sentences.chinese: 我们在电视上看了蜘蛛人的续集。

sentences.english: The Spiderman 3 premiere will be held in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛人3》的首映会将在日本举行。

sentences.english: Whatever happened, we work high above the ground like a spider.
sentences.chinese: 无论高难险阻，我们的高空作业“蜘蛛人”一马平川。

sentences.english: Spiderman is one of my favorite movies.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛人是我喜欢的电影之一。

sentences.english: Whoa, Spidey, love the new outfit.
sentences.chinese: 哇，蜘蛛人，我超爱你的新造型。

definition: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (Tw)/see 忍者神龜|忍者神龟[Ren3 zhe3 Shen2 gui1]
to work high above the ground
to leap onto roofs and vault over walls (usually associated with martial arts)
